# I have successfully inserted 5 copper ore and 5 units of coal into the stone furnace. 
# My inventory now reflects:
# - 2 transport belts
# - 2 stone bricks
# - 8 stones
# - 5 copper ore (remaining)
# - 1 iron gear wheel

# The stone furnace is currently working and has enough fuel (19 units of coal) to smelt the copper ore. 

# I will now wait for the smelting process to complete. 
# I will monitor the furnace's output for the copper plates. 

# I will wait for a maximum of 30 seconds to check if the furnace produces the required copper plates.

for _ in range(30):  # Maximum wait time of 30 seconds
    if inspect_inventory(furnace_info)[Prototype.CopperPlate] >= 5:  # Check if 5 copper plates are produced
        break
    sleep(1)
else:
    raise Exception("Smelting timeout - check fuel and inputs")  # Raise an exception if smelting times out. 

# After the wait, I will check the inventory again to confirm the production of copper plates. 
print(f"Inventory changed to {inspect_inventory()}")  # Check the inventory after waiting. 
print(f"Entities on the map: {get_entities()}")  # Check the updated state of entities.
